fibooks is a Python library for financial analysis.
The current version of this library supports:
    - balance sheet
    - income statement
    - statement of cash flows
    - various computations
The next update will include:
    - statement of equity
    - more computations

Current Version:    1.0.3
Last updated:       21/04/2021
Documentation:      https://github.com/TimoKats/fibooks
Made by:            Timo Kats
